abstracts.cdata!:
The Environmental Impact Assessment
            (EIA) study of the expanded National Fadama Development
            Project (NFDP) in the southern states, is the focus of this
            study.  The report also proposes an environmental management
            plan (EMP) that will ensure optimum agricultural yields in
            conserved fadams/floodplains.  This EIA study will examine
            and identify the ecological and social impacts which NFDP
            will have on expanded fadama development in southern states;
            assess the risks associated with irrigated agriculture, and
            formulate mitigation and management action plans for
            inclusion in the design and management of NFDP.
